product_name: CetaphilGentle Skin Cleanser Face Wash, For Sensitive Skin
summary: SummaryCETAPHIL Gentle Skin Cleanser is a creamy, non-foaming facial cleanser that's ideal for dry to normal skin types. This gentle yet effective face wash uses micellar technology to remove dirt, makeup and impurities while hydrating the skin, helping to keep your skin's natural pH balance in check.
details: DetailsBenefitsClinically proven to cleanse while hydrating, providing 48 hours of hydration when wiped off versus rinsingIDEAL FOR DRY TO NORMAL, SENSITIVE SKIN: Hydrates and soothes as it cleanses, preserving skin's moisture barrier, even after repeat washesDERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED for Sensitive SkinDEFENDS AGAINST 5 SIGNS OF SKIN SENSITIVITY: Dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness and a weakened skin barrierKey IngredientsGlycerin hydrates and moisturizes the skin, improving the skin barrier, and promoting overall skin healthPanthenol (vitamin B5) to hydrate, soothe and preserve the skin barrierNiacinamide (vitamin B3) to help smooth skin's texture and retain skin's moisture barrierFormulated WithoutFragranceSoapParabensSulfatesHypoallergenicNon-comedogenicWon't clog poresItem 2586968How To UseDirections for use with water: apply cleanser and gently massage into skin. Rinse.Directions for use without water: apply a liberal amount of cleanser to face and gently massage into skin. Remove excess with a soft cloth, leaving a thin transparent film on the skin.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Pantolactone, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Directions for use with water: apply cleanser and gently massage into skin. Rinse.Directions for use without water: apply a liberal amount of cleanser to face and gently massage into skin. Remove excess with a soft cloth, leaving a thin transparent film on the skin.

reviews.headline: Received the wrong productâ€¦twice
reviews.comments: I love this face wash, but teceived the wrong product when ordering (not for sensitive skin and oily rather than dry) so I called for a replacement. The replacement was also wrong, it was for sensitive skin but was still the oily rather than dry formula. I give up in trying to get thr correct product and will only purchase this in person from now on!

reviews.headline: Better than expensive brands for Rosacea
reviews.comments: I used this for a long time and then switched to other products to diminish my brown spots. I developed rosacea and came back to this with recommendation from my dermatologist. My face is moisturized and cleared up using this and other prescriptions.

reviews.headline: Not really a cleanser
reviews.comments: This doesnt clean.  Is it gentle? Definitely. Moisturizing? Yes. But I used it to wash off regular nonwaterproof eye makeup and it simply doesn't work. I repeat washed 5 times! And my eyes and skin still had makeup residue.

reviews.headline: Great cleanser.
reviews.comments: I have super sensitive skin. I have lupus which comes with a lupus face rash. This doesn't burn my skin. I use a makeup balm first then this and my skin feels great!

reviews.headline: Bad Batch?
reviews.comments: Not sure if maybe the bottle I bought was a bad batch but it feels so oily on my skin and I've started to break out in acne on my face and upper neck. The color looks a little yellowish too and I just bought it a month ago.

reviews.headline: New formula caused acne
reviews.comments: I have been using the original cleanser for 10+ years and loved it. Now that they have changed the formula I am getting acne all over my face even on my eyelids and I am not acne prone. My Mom who is also a loyal customer is having the same experience. Why change a great product. Garbage.

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: Love how it leaves my face clean and not dry

reviews.headline: Works well with my ultra sensitive skin.
reviews.comments: Works well with my ultra sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: AHHHH OMG
reviews.comments: I got this vacation and girl when I tell you this made my skin look clear and dewy it DOES.also the dirt on my face comes off my face IMMEDIATELY, holy grail frðŸ’•ðŸ¤­

reviews.headline: Horrible
reviews.comments: I bought this because i tried a travel size a while ago and it worked well. However, after using this wash i still have makeup on my face and it makes my skin red. I regret buying.

reviews.headline: Changed formula :(
reviews.comments: Used to love this cleanser.. unfortunately cetaphil changed the formula & its awful now :(

reviews.headline: Adequate
reviews.comments: Perfectly fine, not irritating at all, but doesn't provide a deep clean.

reviews.headline: Oh Cetaphil!
reviews.comments: Let face it (lol) you can't go wrong with Cetaphil. It's gentle on skin and does exactly what it's supposed to. I bought this again after many years of owning several of their products. This is a great wash. Soo gentle and perfect for sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: Great cleanser
reviews.comments: I have dry skin that if I treat properly wont give me too many issues. I have found that the best skincare routine for me is double cleanse with and oil cleanser/ cleansing balm, and then a gentle, hydrating cleanser to follow it up, and a nice think moisturizer. My skin need a cleanser that is lotion-y. Any other ones leave my face feeling stripped immediately after rinsing. This one is lotion-y, unscented, hydrating, doednt strip my skin, and leaves it nice and clean. Perfect for what I need!

reviews.headline: Has a weird smell
reviews.comments: There were more cons than pros with this & cetaphil has better options for sensitive skin. Theres a weird smell to it, i couldnt tell if it was a fragrance or chemicals, but its not good. It also didnt really feel like it did anything.

reviews.headline: love ðŸ©·
reviews.comments: I have atopic dermatitis on my eyelids, and this helps me exfoliate my dry skin on them. It doesnt burn, its moisturizing and its helped my skin so much. I cried when I first used it because i have been on a mission for a year and a half to find something that wont burn my eyes or face. This is it!

reviews.headline: I would buy this again.
reviews.comments: This is good for my face, neck & chest.

reviews.headline: Wonderful cleanser for sensitive skin
reviews.comments:
Love this cleanser! I am allergic with fragrance in it.
This product (light blue/ sensitive skin) doesn't not make me break out. It also helps get rid of any makeup I missed from using makeup removing wipes. It is gentle enough to cleanse around your eyes as well!

reviews.headline: â˜†â˜†â˜†
reviews.comments: it still irritated my skin :(

reviews.headline: Works if you need something gentle
reviews.comments: It's consistency is like watered down lotion. Get your face wet. Let it sit on your face for like a minute. Then rinse off. Super gentle, so if you need to use multiple face cleansers a day- this is great because it won't strip you. I use this in the morning - just to clean off those lotions/potions from the night before. At night I use either this or a stronger cleanser like Aveeno brightening cleanser.

media.headline: It's gentle but caused me to breakout!
Perfect Product !
media.caption: This is me being 45 years old   !!!!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I wanted to take time to say there are two products that I love ! Cetaphil Gentil Skin Cleanser For All Skin Types and Cetaphl Moisturizing Lotion For All Skin Types. Both are perfect and I love!! I have been using since 2010 and I love how makes my skin feel and I love that I can use for face and body. I turned 45 years old this year and I am aways told that I look like I'm 20 !! I total believe that this is because of using Cetaphil Gentle Skin Clenser For All Skin Types and Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion For All Skin Types !
I feel so fortunate to have found amazing and perfect products.
faceoff_positive.headline: Perfect Product !

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been using Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser for over 35 years. It is NOT the same formula that I remember. The viscosity is not what it used to be. This once creamy and effective product has disappeared only to be replaced by a very watery substance that falls through my fingers. I think this is a serious disservice to many loyal customers that have been using this product over the course of a lifetime. Very expensive and a complete waste. Very disappointing.
faceoff_negative.headline: Viscosity is not what it used to be

rollup.name: Gentle Skin Cleanser Face Wash, For Sensitive Skin
